SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Application
Represents a student's application for an internship opportunity.
ApplicationRepository
Stores and retrieves Application entities.
ApplicationService
 
AuthService
AuthService is a service (control) class responsible for handling user authentication logic such as login, logout, and password changes.
AuthUI
Handles login and registration functions for the system.
CareerCenterStaff
Represents a Career Center Staff member in the internship placement system.
CompanyRepresentative
Represents a company representative who can create internship opportunities and review student applications.
CompanyUI
UI for Company Representatives to manage opportunities and applications.
ConsoleApp
Bootstraps the system and launches the interactive console UI.
ConsoleUI
Main boundary controller for driving the Internship Placement Management System.
CSVFileWriter
Utility for writing company representative CSV files and entries.
DataReloader
Utility to reload persisted CSV files into in-memory repositories.
DateRange
Represents a date range with a start and end date.
FileImporter
Utility FileImporter Reads CSV/Excel-like data files and converts them into model objects.
IdGenerator
Generates unique incremental IDs with a given prefix.
InputHelper
Handles console input/output to prevent code duplication.
InternshipOpportunity
Represents an internship opportunity created by a company representative.
NotificationService
 
OpportunityFilter
Per-user filter for browsing internship opportunities.
OpportunityFilter.SortKey
 
OpportunityFilterCriteria
Read-only view of opportunity filter criteria.
OpportunityRepository
Stores and retrieves InternshipOpportunity entities.
OpportunityService
 
PasswordHasher
Class for hashing and verifying passwords using the BCrypt algorithm.
RegistrationRequest
 
Report
Represents a complete generated report containing multiple rows.
ReportFilter
Represents filter criteria for generating internship opportunity reports.
ReportFilterCriteria
Read-only view of report filter criteria.
ReportRow
 
ReportService
Generates aggregated reports of opportunities and applications.
RequestRepository
Stores and retrieves Requests: Registration and Withdrawal.
StaffUI
UI for Career Center Staff interactions (approvals, reports, filtering).
Student
Represents a student in the Internship Placement Management System.
StudentUI
Boundary class that exposes the student console menu for toggling visibility, browsing/applying to opportunities, viewing applications, accepting offers, and requesting withdrawals, along with filter management.
UIFactory
Responsible for creating the correct UI implementation based on the User type.
User
Represents the abstract parent class for the 3 distinct users: Student, Company Representative and Career Centre Staff
UserInterface
Defines the contract for all role-specific UIs.
UserRepository
Stores and retrieves User entities such as Student, CompanyRepresentative, and CareerCenterStaff.
UserService
UserService handles user retrieval, company-rep registration workflow, and loading users from file via FileImporter.
Validator
Provides common validation methods for IDs and emails.
WithdrawalRequest
Represents a Student's request to withdraw from an internship application.
